verbs.description: chris sale ‘ a lot easier’ to [V: hit] when throwing slower the houston astros were pleasantly surprised to find chris sale velocity down a few ticks in game 1 of the alcs and they took advantage of the boston red sox ace issues the astros got sale out of the game after just four innings in a 7 - 2 win on saturday and outfielder josh reddick certainly noticed the difference in sale velocity which topped out around 93 - 94 mph instead of his usual upper-90s josh reddick on chris sale chris sale houston astros astros reddick josh reddick boston red sox
